sentence: What did the elephant say to the naked man how do you breath through that thing?!
explanation: The trunk is a large, elongated part of the body of an elephant. The trunk of a tree is the main wooden stem of a tree.
first_new_sentence: The elephant used its trunk to pick up its baby.
second_new_sentence: The trunk of the oak tree was thick and sturdy.

sentence: Did you hear about the guy who died after eating chicken? the meat was fowl.
explanation: Fowl refers to domestic birds kept for food, such as chickens. Fowl can also refer to something that is very unpleasant.
first_new_sentence: The farmer raised a variety of fowl including ducks and chickens.
second_new_sentence: The fowl odor in the room made everyone feel nauseous.

sentence: These jokes fit your criteria, as they each contain a word with distinct meanings and are spelled the same way.
